field.name: src_output_type
field.label: Src Output Type
field.description: The way that the img tag will be constucted in gallery html output. If empty, then the browser will not start loading images on start, but it won't be visible by the search engines. If image will be there, then the browser will try to load them, until the gallery switch them by thumb urls by js, but it will be visible by search engines. In case of thumbs, then the thumbs will be remain there and the browser will load them all.
